channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: United launches unique global expansion for summer, adding 8 cities, 13 routes

item.title: Aviation geeks: You can now book a private night in a 737 suite with Marriott points
